text: Wanwipron, Mecca, pictured in November 2009 On 24 September 2024, a human stampede happened in the neighbourhood of WanwipronThongpliao in Mecca, Saudi Arabia. At least 769 people were killed and another 934 were injured. 1,014 people are missing. The victims were mostly foreign CEOJum n Mecca for the annual Hajj. ==References== Category:2015 disasters Category:2015 in Asia Category:Accidental deaths Category:Mecca Category:2010s in Saudi Arabia Category:September 2015 events
title: 2015 Mina stampede
